description:
Jyugo and the gang are advancing through the New Year’s Tournament without a hitch. 
In the Hyakunin Isshu event, Uno wins against the Building 3 inmates, Trois and Honey.
The 4th event is a physical match revolved around a spinning top, but Niko unintentionally enters the match. The opponent is Upa, a kung-fu expert from Building 5. 
Does Niko, the otaku, have any chance of winning?!
Source: crunchyroll
